<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A note on thread groups: Tasks are by default in no group (represented</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by nullptr ThreadPoolTaskGroup pointer in the Tasks queue) and functionality</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here normally works on all tasks regardless of their group (functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in that case receive nullptr ThreadPoolTaskGroup pointer as argument).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A task in a group has a pointer to that ThreadPoolTaskGroup in the Tasks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// queue, and functions called to work only on tasks from one group take that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ActiveGroups.count(Group) == 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">         !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">llvm::any&#95;of</a>(Tasks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       &#91;Group&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>.second == Group; &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StdThreadPool::wait() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!isWorkerThread()); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Would deadlock waiting for itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait for all threads to complete and the queue to be empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unique&#95;lock&lt;std::mutex&gt; LockGuard(QueueLock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CompletionCondition.wait(LockGuard,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           &#91;&amp;&#93; &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> workCompletedUnlocked(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StdThreadPool::wait(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &amp;Group) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait for all threads in the group to complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isWorkerThread()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::unique&#95;lock&lt;std::mutex&gt; LockGuard(QueueLock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CompletionCondition.wait(LockGuard,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             &#91;&amp;&#93; &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> workCompletedUnlocked(&amp;Group); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure to not deadlock waiting for oneself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CurrentThreadTaskGroups == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">         !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">llvm::is&#95;contained</a>(&#42;CurrentThreadTaskGroups, &amp;Group));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle the case of recursive call from another task in a different group,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in which case process tasks while waiting to keep the thread busy and avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible deadlock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  processTasks(&amp;Group);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a236c25c2602047e633c2ae38bac9ce17">llvm::sys::ScopedReader</a> LockGuard(ThreadsLock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  llvm:{':thread:'}:id CurrentThreadId = llvm::this&#95;thread::get&#95;id();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thread">llvm::thread</a> &amp;Thread : Threads)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurrentThreadId == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/#abd325b49b8e2f00c0370b1c68cf51557a464696eb6092395b24545604b7895ade">Thread</a>.get&#95;id())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The destructor joins all threads, waiting for completion.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sequential implementation running the tasks</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
